channel.title: Analysis on Xinning
channel.description: Recent content in Analysis on Xinning

item.title: 众安保险-数据科学应用中心
item.description: Zhongan Online Property Insurance Co., Ltd. was jointly established by Ant Financial, Ping An of China, and Tencent in 2013. 众安在线财产保险股份有限公司由蚂蚁金服、中国平安和腾讯于2013年联合发起设立。 It focuses on reshaping the insurance value chain with new technologies, centering around four major ecosystems: health, digital life, consumer finance, and automobiles.

item.title: 不背单词APP-设计数据分析
item.description: Partners：Lufei Ding , Zhilei Li We focus on data analysis for a specific APP, starting from product positioning, competitive analysis, and user perspective. We analyze the product information architecture,use the HEART model and GSM model to analysis core business paths and speculate on event tracking design.
